title: Antarctica (Episode 3)
brief_description: Looks at the heroic early exploration of the continent and the ensuing exploitation if its wildlife, the flora and fauna, and the scientific studies beng carried out in Antarctica today. The possibility of future utilization of Antarctica’s mineral wealth is discusssed.
